title: DPM Dar, Uzbek FM discuss bilateral ties, UAP Railway project
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 25 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar and Foreign Minister of the Republic of Uzbekistan Saidov Bakhtiyor Odilovich Sunday discussed existing bilateral relations, particularly Uzbekistan-Afghanistan-Pakistan (UAP) Railway Line Project.
The DPM/FM held a telephone conversation with the Uzbek foreign minister, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
The two leaders expressed the hope that the framework agreement for the regional connectivity project would be finalized soon. Views were also exchanged on the current regional situation.
